name: GolfSportVR
description:
Multiple course 

- Select clubs: Golf, Tennis, Hockey, Baseball 

- Multiple targets: Bowling, Archery, Handball, Football, Soccer, Basketball, Foot US Helmet, and more 

- Enable: Birds, Wind, Rain, Clouds, Water, Animals, Day&Night, and more 

- TV Cameras (watching your left hand, or above the scoreboard) 

- Scorecard summary - Leaderboard: Compare your score Vs other players 

- Click on the Oculus menu button to access menu and options
